alert.note: Alert for Deltana and Tanana Flats; Eastern Alaska Range; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 12:14PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Heavy Rain Expected Over The Southeast Interior Through Tuesday Night... The Southeast Interior will see heavy showers southeast of Delta Junction to Chicken today through Tuesday night. Expect 0.50 to 1.50 inch of rain southeast of Delta Junction to Eagle through Tuesday night, with the heaviest amounts along the Alaska Range east of Dot Lake. This will cause sharp rises on rivers and streams in the Fortymile, Charley, Goodpaster and Upper Tanana River basins tonight through Wednesday. Streams and small rivers draining the Alaska Range east of Dot Lake will have an elevated risk for flooding tonight through Wednesday. People along creeks and rivers in those basins should be alert to rapidly rising water levels tonight through Wednesday.

area.areaDesc: Deltana and Tanana Flats; Eastern Alaska Range; Upper Tanana Valley and the Fortymile Country
